医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
新的AI模型可以预测人类细胞类型的基因表达来自Dana-Farber癌症研究所，麻省理工学院和哈佛大学，Google和哥伦比亚大学的研究人员组成了一个人工智能模型，可以预测哪些基因在任何类型的人类细胞中都表达。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250131/new-ai-model-predicts-gene-predicts-gene-expression-across-human-cell-types.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250131/new-ai-model-predicts-gene-cene-expression-across-human-cell-types.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bef6fe83-d383-4225-8f96-f0027be1292c Fri, 31 Jan 2025 23:59:41 -0500 New AI model predicts gene expression across human cell types
用CAS12A进行基因编辑的突破，用于建模人类疾病澳大利亚癌症研究人员是第一个建立下一代基因编辑工具，用于建模和询问人类疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250131/breakthrough-in-gene-gene-editing-with-cas12a-for-modeling-human-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250131/breakthrough-in-gene-gene-editing-with-cas12a-for-modeling-human-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f5f2c8a3-b3cd-45D3-9EB5-D1D5E3A90389 Fri, 31 Jan 2025 23:57:13 -0500 Breakthrough in gene-editing with Cas12a for modeling human diseases
新方法可以用矿物纳米颗粒中和冠状病毒瑞典农业科学大学和塔尔图大学的研究人员发现了一种中和冠状病毒和其他膜爆发病毒的新方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250131/new-method-can-neutralize-coronaviruses-with-mineral-nananoparticles.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250131/new-method-can-neutralize-coronaviruess-with-mineral-nananoparticles.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=282722d9-8b2a-4961-4961-98b7-d82c012f7858 Fri, 31 Jan 2025 23:50:46 -0500 New method can neutralize coronaviruses with mineral nanoparticles
COVID-19与急诊室罢工增加有关的大流行长期以来，研究人员知道，在医疗建议使用更多急诊服务之前离开急诊室的患者更有可能被送往医院并面临更高的护理成本 - 以及死亡率提高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250131/covid-19-pandemic-linked-to-to-to-to-increard-to-increard-encreard-emergency-department-walkouts.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250131/covid-19-pandemic-linked-to to-increard-to-increard-encreard-encreard-emergency-department-walkouts.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=32f80b33-cb10-477E-9F99-F99-F20E33404083 Fri, 31 Jan 2025 23:46:35 -0500 COVID-19 pandemic linked to increased emergency department walkouts
当治疗患有心脏病的老年患者时，古代药物每年可以节省数百万美元一种名为二高辛的240年历史的药物每年可以节省至少1亿英镑的国家卫生服务（NHS），当时治疗房颤和心力衰竭的老年患者。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250131/ancient-drug-could-save-nhs-nhs-millions-each-each-each-each-when-when-when-when-when-patients-patients-patients with-heart-conditions.aspxs.aspxs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250131/ancient-drug-could-save-nhs-nhs-millions-each-each-each-each-each-when-when-parting-patients-patients-patients with-heart-conditions.aspx#comments.comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=48905869-110D-461A-B8C4-23E54E64CC51 Fri, 31 Jan 2025 23:40:24 -0500 Ancient drug could save NHS millions each year when treating older patients with heart conditions
免疫系统发现可能会彻底改变慢性疾病和癌症的治疗关于使免疫系统维持长期保护的机制的发现，可以改变对慢性疾病和癌症的治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250131/immune-system-discovery-could-could-could-revolutionize-wareatment-for-chronic-disease-disease-disease-and-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250131/immune-system-discovery-could-could-could-revolutions-fore-for-for-for-chronic-disease-disease-disease-and-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=05c9a3cd-0809-43f3-9397-9397-908223219a5f Fri, 31 Jan 2025 23:30:56 -0500 Immune system discovery could revolutionize treatment for chronic disease and cancer
早期的成年死亡率仍高于预期的大流行明尼苏达大学和波士顿大学公共卫生学院（BUSPH）的新研究表明，早期成年人或25-44岁的成年人的死亡率在19009年的大流行期间急剧上升，并且比预期的后流行病更高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250131/early-adult-death-rates-rates-remain-higher-than-than-than-than-than-than-this-this-post-post-pandemic.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250131/Early-adult-death-rates-remain-higher-than-expected-post-pandemic.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=967a8792-7b12-48b7-8633-38351f7f7fefe7 Fri, 31 Jan 2025 23:24:30 -0500 Early adult death rates remain higher than expected post-pandemic
疼痛应对能力训练减轻疼痛并改善透析患者的生活质量接受血液透析治疗肾脏衰竭的人经常会经历与病情有关的慢性疼痛，但是使用阿片类药物和其他常规治疗可能很难处理。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250131/pain-coping-skills-training-training-reduces-pain-pain-and-improves-memproves-mequality for-for-for-for-for-for-for-for-for-for-for-for-for-for-for-for-for-for-for-for-for-for-for-for-for-for-for-for-dialysis-patients.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250131/Pain-coping-skills-training-reduces-pain-and-improves-quality-of-life-for-dialysis-patients.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7Be0c726-8A85-4CB1-8737-A525E630D8B0 Fri, 31 Jan 2025 23:14:43 -0500 Pain coping skills training reduces pain and improves quality of life for dialysis patients
混合弥漫性光学可能会彻底改变重症监护的血流监测红细胞输血（RBCT）是患有贫血的重症患者的挽救生命治疗，这种情况是人体缺乏足够健康的红细胞来有效递送氧气的疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250131/hybrid-diffuse-optics-could-revolutions-could-blood-flow-flow-monitoring-in-critical-critical-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250131/hybrid-diffuse-optics-could-revolutions-could-blood-flow-flow-monitoring-in-critical-critical-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2823E318-F7EF-4A56-A337-518FC4892564 Fri, 31 Jan 2025 23:08:33 -0500 Hybrid diffuse optics could revolutionize blood flow monitoring in critical care
研究可以帮助预测KRASG12C突变非小细胞肺癌的治疗反应莫菲特癌症中心的一项新研究可以帮助医生预测特定类型的肺癌患者对新疗法的反应。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250131/study-could-help-predict-treatment-treatment-response-for-krasg12c-mutant-non-non-small-small-cell-cell-cell-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250131/study-could-help-predict-treatment-treatment-response-for-krasg12c-mutant-non-non-small-small-cell-cell-cell-cell-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cfb1846e-6280-431a-431A-A8B4-F03CB02596D6 Fri, 31 Jan 2025 22:54:46 -0500 Study could help predict treatment response for KRASG12C-mutant non-small cell lung cancer
